NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.text: PB L1 will show currently selected WP, PB R6 will show the current acquisition WP

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.action: Select the Phase type (ATK or NAV)

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.text: NAV will create NAV points, ATK will create TARGET points

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.action: Review abbreviation codes with POINT followed by ABR
To add, edit or delete a WP, press POINT
Select EDIT, ADD or DEL as required

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.text: You can also slew over existing or new WP in the right MFD map using the cyclic cursor and select an existing or new WP location by pressing ADD or EDIT followed by cursor enter
To move cursor across screens move to edge of screen and double tab screen direction intended

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.action: When adding or Editing a WP, select IDENT(?)
Select intended WP or leave empty for next WP in sequence followed by ENT
In FREE text assign code followed by ENT
Enter desired WP followed by ENT
Enter altitude in feet followed by ENT

NAVIGATION WP CREATION AND EDIT.text: You can review WP information by pressing COORD (PB T5) followed by WPTHZ (PB T1) and selecting the WP right row (PB R1-6)
You can set the WP as acquisition in the same page by selecting the WP left row (PB L1-6). Acquisition will be shown on PB R6 in TSD

NAVIGATION ROUTE CREATION AND EDIT.text: If you don't have any WP created you will need to do that first

NAVIGATION ROUTE CREATION AND EDIT.action: Select EDIT or ADD as required
Slew over existing WP with cyclic cursor and select WP with cursor enter

NAVIGATION ROUTE CREATION AND EDIT.text: To move cursor across screens move to edge of screen and double tab screen direction intended

NAVIGATION ROUTE CREATION AND EDIT.locationText: Will always show last WP added

NAVIGATION ROUTE CREATION AND EDIT.text: You can review WP information by pressing COORD (PB T5) followed by WPTHZ (PB T1) and selecting the WP right row (PB R1-6)
You can set the WP as acquisition in the same page by selecting the WP left row (PB L1-6). Acquisition will be shown on PB R6 in TSD

NAVIGATION ROUTE GO DIRECT.text: If you don't have any WP created you will need to do that first

NAVIGATION ROUTE GO DIRECT.action: Slew over existing WP with cyclic cursor and select WP with cursor enter

NAVIGATION ROUTE GO DIRECT.text: To move cursor across screens move to edge of screen and double tab screen direction intended

NAVIGATION FLYBY WP.action: Select the Phase type (ATK or NAV)

NAVIGATION FLYBY WP.text: NAV will create NAV points, ATK will create TARGET points
